title: Ex-NBA star Lamar Odom is alert and improving, his aunt says
text: Lamar Odom's Aunt Says He is Alive And Making Improvements 00:51 Lamar Odom's family has said the NBA star's condition is improving after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel a week ago.There has been no date set of when Odom will be able to leave the hospital but a statement from the family said that Odom is overcoming "insurmountable obstacles" and... Recent related news Former NBA star Lamar Odom is breathing on his own and told his estranged wife, Khloe Kardashian, “I love you,” according to his former coach Jim Harrick....
